about_the_game:
Step into a world of magic and mystery in ""Sword and Seek,"" a charming hand-drawn fantasy cozy hidden object game. Set in an era of peace, you play a humble adventurer eager to embark on your own journey. When an invitation from the kingdom arrives, inviting you to receive the blessing of the goddesses, you think, ""What can possibly go wrong?"" 

Find quest items scattered throughout interactable hand-drawn scenes. As you journey through bustling villages, dungeons, and ancient ruins levels, find and collect quirky characters to help you along the way!

Seek the truth behind the kingdom's invitation and start your own adventure in this fantasy tale.

Follow our Tiktok for Sword and Seek progress updates, first-looks, devlogs and cute little videos.
detailed_description:
Feature List

  • Fantasy Story Adventure: Immerse yourself in a cozy and enchanting tale filled with magic and mystery

  • Hand-Drawn Scenes: Each scene is meticulously illustrated and animated to create a unique isometric visual

  • Fully Interactive Levels: Interact with vibrant environments, click on every item and watch them animate

  • Character Companions: Collect and interact with up to five unique companions who offer special abilities

  • Exploration: Travel through various locations including a town, dungeon cave, and magic towers and forest river, each with its own set of challenges and hidden items to find.
